nodes.text: Kag'areth Queen was a female Colicoid Queen of the Kag'areth nest of mutated Colicoids that lived on the planet Balmorra during the Cold War. The Kag'areth overtook a facility near Camp Victory on the Gorinth Plateau and made it into their nest, with the Kag'areth Queen taking up residence in the lower levels. In his efforts to undermine his superior Colonel Sartius, Lieutenant Major Pirrell hired a bounty hunter to attack the nest and kill the queen, thereby riling up the Colicoids.
Kag'areth Queen appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Bounty Hunter class mission on Balmorra.
